basic_information.scholarship_name: Barbara Kay Gilmore Endowed Scholarship for Drama in Memory of Russell and Hazel Gilmore
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2009 to support the UCO Theatre Arts Department. The scholarship was established and funded by the Russell and Hazel Gilmore Trust in honor of their daughter, the late Barbara Kay Gilmore. Barbara graduated from the University of Central Oklahoma, then known as Central State College, in 1966 with a B.S. in Education and subsequently taught drama in Kingfisher, Oklahoma until her passing. Eligibility Theatre performance major Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Sophomore, junior, senior or graduate student Completed 30+ hours Requirements Financial need considered Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
